site_name: PETER S ORNELAS & DEBRA SIEVERS JONES

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:30 am on Friday,
November 18, 2022. I spoke with one licensee, who was sick. I left voicemail messages for the other licensee, who did
not return my calls. I left my contact information at the facility, side door of the house.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:30 am on Friday, 
November 18, 2022.  I spoke with one licensee, who was sick.  I left voicemail messages for the other licensee, who did 
not return my calls.  I left my contact information at the facility, side door of the house. 
 
 
 
End Section
